title: New: Alt-J – Left Hand Free
body:
Lifted from their forthcoming sophomore album, **_This Is All Yours_**, _Left Hand Free_ is the second taster we’ve heard from British trio **Alt-J**.

More of a development on their sound than lead single, Hunger of the Pine, it’s groovier and dare I say it, even verging upon ‘rock’ territory, clearly taking props from Floyd and The Rolling Stones. Check it out below.
